title: 08/18/2021 - Best of The Herd
itunes:title: 08/18/2021 - Best of The Herd
description:
Colin explains why the "boring" Cowboys we are witnessing on Hard Knocks is actually a good thing for America's Team heading into the 2021 regular season. He gives some advice to a super star quarterback in the NFL in order to stay in contention for Super Bowls at this point in his career. He looks over all the QB competitions around the league and shares what they all have in common. Plus, Super Bowl Champion Antoine Bethea joins the show to tell Colin which rookie QBs should start week 1 and which ones need to sit and learn from the veterans.

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
